ARABIC: فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةً وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: for the punishment did come down them. There is certainly a Sign in that, yet most of them are not
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For they were seized by the torment. Verily there was a sign in this, but most of them did not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So the chastisement seized them. Surely there is a Sign in this, but most of them would not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and torment struck them. In this there is evidence of the Truth, yet many people do not have any faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The punishment therefore seized them; indeed in this is a sign; and most of them were not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, the torment overtook them. Verily, in this is indeed a sign, yet most of them are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So the punishment overtook them. Most surely there is a sign in this, but most of them do not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and the chastisement seized them. Surely in that is a sign, yet most of them are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So the retribution came on them. Lo! herein is indeed a portent, yet most of them are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: so the punishment came down upon them. Surely in that there is a sign, but most of them would not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So the torment took hold of them: verily herein is a sign, but most of them are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So the punishment seized them. There is indeed a sign in that; but most of them do not have faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But the Penalty seized them. Verily in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So the torment overtook them. Verily, in this is indeed a sign, yet most of them are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and the punishment seized them. Surely, in that there is a sign. Yet most of them do not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So the punishment overtook them. Surely in this is a sign, but most of them are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the punishment seized them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:158] So they were seized by the chastisement, which had been promised and were destroyed. Surely in that there is a sign; but most of them are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So the retribution came on them) after three days. (Lo! Herein) in that which We did to them (is indeed a portent) a sign and an admonition for those who came after them, (yet most of them are not believers) they were not believers and were all disbelievers.
